section.title: DMA_InitTypeDef Struct Reference
section.section:
Field Documentation
DMA_BufferSize DMA_BufferSizeDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_BufferSize
uint32_t DMA_BufferSize
Specifies the buffer size, in data unit, of the specified Stream. The data unit is equal to the configuration set in DMA_PeripheralDataSize or DMA_MemoryDataSize members depending in the transfer direction.
DMA_Channel DMA_ChannelDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_Channel
uint32_t DMA_Channel
Specifies the channel used for the specified stream. This parameter can be a value of DMA_channel
DMA_DIR DMA_DIRDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_DIR
uint32_t DMA_DIR
Specifies if the data will be transferred from memory to peripheral, from memory to memory or from peripheral to memory. This parameter can be a value of DMA_data_transfer_direction
DMA_FIFOMode DMA_FIFOModeDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_FIFOMode
uint32_t DMA_FIFOMode
Specifies if the FIFO mode or Direct mode will be used for the specified Stream. This parameter can be a value of DMA_fifo_direct_mode Note
The Direct mode (FIFO mode disabled) cannot be used if the memory-to-memory data transfer is configured on the selected Stream
DMA_FIFOThreshold DMA_FIFOThresholdDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_FIFOThreshold
uint32_t DMA_FIFOThreshold
Specifies the FIFO threshold level. This parameter can be a value of DMA_fifo_threshold_level
DMA_Memory0BaseAddr DMA_Memory0BaseAddrDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_Memory0BaseAddr
uint32_t DMA_Memory0BaseAddr
Specifies the memory 0 base address for DMAy Streamx. This memory is the default memory used when double buffer mode is not enabled.
DMA_MemoryBurst DMA_MemoryBurstDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_MemoryBurst
uint32_t DMA_MemoryBurst
Specifies the Burst transfer configuration for the memory transfers. It specifies the amount of data to be transferred in a single non interruptable transaction. This parameter can be a value of DMA_memory_burst Note
The burst mode is possible only if the address Increment mode is enabled.
DMA_MemoryDataSize DMA_MemoryDataSizeDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_MemoryDataSize
uint32_t DMA_MemoryDataSize
Specifies the Memory data width. This parameter can be a value of DMA_memory_data_size
DMA_MemoryInc DMA_MemoryIncDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_MemoryInc
uint32_t DMA_MemoryInc
Specifies whether the memory address register should be incremented or not. This parameter can be a value of DMA_memory_incremented_mode
DMA_Mode DMA_ModeDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_Mode
uint32_t DMA_Mode
Specifies the operation mode of the DMAy Streamx. This parameter can be a value of DMA_circular_normal_mode Note
The circular buffer mode cannot be used if the memory-to-memory data transfer is configured on the selected Stream
DMA_PeripheralBaseAddr DMA_PeripheralBaseAddrDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_PeripheralBaseAddr
uint32_t DMA_PeripheralBaseAddr
Specifies the peripheral base address for DMAy Streamx.
DMA_PeripheralBurst DMA_PeripheralBurstDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_PeripheralBurst
uint32_t DMA_PeripheralBurst
Specifies the Burst transfer configuration for the peripheral transfers. It specifies the amount of data to be transferred in a single non interruptable transaction. This parameter can be a value of DMA_peripheral_burst Note
The burst mode is possible only if the address Increment mode is enabled.
DMA_PeripheralDataSize DMA_PeripheralDataSizeDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_PeripheralDataSize
uint32_t DMA_PeripheralDataSize
Specifies the Peripheral data width. This parameter can be a value of DMA_peripheral_data_size
DMA_PeripheralInc DMA_PeripheralIncDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_PeripheralInc
uint32_t DMA_PeripheralInc
Specifies whether the Peripheral address register should be incremented or not. This parameter can be a value of DMA_peripheral_incremented_mode
DMA_Priority DMA_PriorityDMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitTypeDefDMA_Priority
uint32_t DMA_Priority
Specifies the software priority for the DMAy Streamx. This parameter can be a value of DMA_priority_level
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: CUBE_IDE/VGA/Core/Inc/stm32f4xx_dma.h
